reviews.review_text: This place is a neighborhood gem with specials Monday to thursday and take out specials available  all the time. The food is fresh and made from scratch and the service is friendly. I am here often because their specials are sometimes cheaper and quicker than making food at home and they have air conditioning for when its just too hot to cook. Our favorites are the channa masala, chicken masala and vindaloo. Vegetarian options: They have a whole list of vegetarian curries Dietary restrictions: Most of their curries have gluten in them Parking: Parking along Kingsway and in the neighborhood
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, Kat! We look forward to seeing you again soon and we appreciate your frequent visits.

reviews.review_text: The food was outstanding. I was there with a friend who doesnt care for the taste of coconut. I suggested it to him and he fell in love with the coconut chicken. I took another friend with me and she loved the food very much. The naan bread is out of  this world!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Gerard, Thank you so much for sharing your love of our food with your friends. It is the greatest compliment and we are very grateful. We look forward to having you in again soon, thank you again!

reviews.review_text: Tasty food and very friendly staff. Decor is fairly nondescript/unassuming. The chicken biryani and curry had some generous pieces. Would come back. Updating my review: Ive been ordering from this restaurant every few days via Uber Eats. So delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your continued business, Janice! We appreciate it and hope to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: Hidden gem. I always eat next door but really happy with the food today.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for joining us today Derek! We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: This is the new place for Indian food that we REALLY   enjoyed last week. They have specials everyday of the weekdays as well. Plus they deliver. The service was very polite and pleasant. Answered all our questions . Rice is a side dish which is the way I like it when it comes entrees. This allows for people like diabetes to order off the menu including vegetarian dishes with our having to worry about starch and sugar... Yay. We have the tandoori chicken  and wonderful dip for the chicken. I think it was cilantro. I of course had the chicken curry and was allowed to select how much heat I wanted for my dish. We also had a few vegetable side dishes too. The garlic Naan was so   yummy
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Vincent, Thank you for your positive review! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I got delivery on door dash. Ordered the chicken masala, vegetable samosas, Naan and rice. Super tasty, generous portions and fairly priced! The chicken masala is soooo yummy, super flavorful and the right amount of a kick!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi JT, Thank you for your lovely review! We re so glad you enjoyed everything and we look forward to having you in again soon - Grace of India

reviews.review_text: My favorite place for a cozy dinner! The food is always on point, service is great and the sitting area is comfortable and  clean. The fried cassava is so good! Always crispy The portions are very generous and their to go boxes are mess free! Cant wait to go back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your positive review, Luisa! We appreciate it and we hope to serve you again soon. The Grace of India team

reviews.review_text: Probably the best Indian food in Vancouver. Highly recommended! The food is freshly cooked and taste really luxurious. For a restaurant, the price is really affordable and the staff are friendly. The place is also clean and has enough parking spaces at the back. I highly recommend any of their curry with Paneer Naan. The best combo! Their weekday specials are a must try too to sample their menu at a really affordable price.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nowell, Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We really appreciate it and we hope to see you again soon. - Grace of India team

reviews.review_text: First time trying this place. Great taste!! Very rich and filling! I had enough leftovers for two extra meals! Their naan is super soft and has that great elastic texture as well. Also got samosas and they were excellent. I wish they served pani puri though! That would be overtop the for me!

Fantastic Indian food, never tasted better. I still wish that you got a pitcher for yourself. In addition, there s a table right under the air conditioning, don t sit there if you don t wanna get too cold!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for coming in Dameii! We thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Amazing food, compassionate service, jamming music and generous portions. I always rely on Grace of India for my late study nights and dates. So filling. The naan is always huge and yummy, get the Palak paneer for a great time! Favourite dish on the menu! Got there on an empty night, couldnt believe it! Please visit this place, the waiter was so kind and food was fast and delicious. Space was fancy with booths and subtle wood decorations. Love it! Been here 6 times, gonna keep going!

Came here to try their dine out menu, portion was great, service was really attentive, he kept coming to check on us every 15mins or so, and the food was absolutely delicious :) will come back again for sure
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your positive review, Cecile! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Amazing deals one can get here! The food is fresh and yum. I visit this place quite often for Delicious Cholle Bhature. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive review, Khyati! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: We were looking for a nice spot to eat a warm meal in a rainy night. I checked the reviews for Grace of India, and we decided to give the restaurant a try. Boy, Im glad we did! This small, family-run restaurant is a gem. The food is delicious. We enjoyed Lamb Masala and Lamb Saag. Both were great.tender lamb, just the right amount of spice. My friend asked for the Lamb Masala to be mild spiced, and I asked for a spicy Saag. Both dishes were right on! I highly recommend this place. Service was friendly and quick, and the restaurant is best and clean.

I ordered shahi paneer and veg beryani and it was so yummy. I tried so many places for Indian food but so far grace of India on Kingsway  is the best place for Indian food. It is actually hidden gems. Best Customer Service!!! Thanks Grace
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your positive review Gurmeet! We appreciate it and we hope to serve you again soon. - Grace of India team

reviews.review_text: Always delicious food and great friendly service. The fish pakoras were so yummy!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive review Pauline, we hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Really great, fresh authentic Indian food in a relaxed atmosphere with good service at a reasonable price.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review Kevin, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Nice ambience. Nice and spacious.awesome food taste is really nice. Must try paneer paratha, kofta aloo paratha and biryani... yummmyyyy Kulfi falooda is a must to try awesome
I ve been living so near to this restaurant, but never visited. I m glad I did now, amazing food. Great service. They ve nice lounge, quick service and clean restaurant.

I picked up lunch here for the first time today. I got the Thursday vegetarian lunch special, which  included two veggies dishes, rice,  2 pieces of naan and a dessert for $10. I also got a cup of chai. Excellent value and everything was delicious. The service was friendly and fast. Ill definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Tui, Thank you for your positive review! We re glad you enjoyed everything and we look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I have only ordered in from them and has the aloo Gobi, eggplant bhartha, and dal makhani. They can make it a bit less spicy which is great since I have colitis and have certain things I can eat only (hence only having those dishes - works for me!). I have their dal regularly and am in with it (ordered again for lunch at work). 5 stars!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive review! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Go for their specials and be hooked. This is a family run restaurant. Some dishes were new to me and beyond delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive review! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Our new go to place for Indian food. Fish Korma was awesome.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star rating Dennis, we look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Went here for dineout and very impressed! So glad we found this spot. Great food and incredible service. The owners son was so easy to talk to. Well be coming back for their weekly specials!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive review, Owen! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I love the service here and the food is really good. They have a good lunch special that s nice for one person. Would recommend the coconut chicken curry!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Violet, thank you for taking the time to write your positive review! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Monday Special of Curry + Naan + Rice for only $8.99 how could you ever beat that!?!? Great flavours, friendly staff and quick service. My partner and I first went to check out this restaurant on a Monday to get this great deal and the yummy food has convinced us to keep coming back! Dont have time on a Monday, no problem, their menu is very affordable and has a variety of selections to choose from!

Wow! I ordered a veggie meal for one and I thought it would just be sort of a mixed platter but I got six containers including dessert and warm naan. It s so delicious and way above and beyond what I expected. Great price I thought as well.
Great service, delicious food and incredible prices!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star review M, we hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: One of the best Indian cuisine I have had. And better yet it has a very reasonable price to match. The food has good portions, the staff is attentive, and in my many experiences there I never had any issue with digestion. I would recommend getting the Malai Chicken with Coconut, but pretty much any choice is gonna be good.
Amazing food and experience. I love the food and it tastes amazing!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind rating! See you again soon.

reviews.review_text: We have been going to this place for a few months and picking up takeout since the pandemic. Their food is consistently delicious and the curry portions are always good to feed me and my husband. Some of my favorite dishes are the chicken malai coconut, the lamb saag, and the veggie korma. The service is friendly and warm and they are good at making sure that the food is made within the time that they suggest. Love this place!

This Indian food is some of the best Ive ever had. My wife and I eat here at least once a week. Their food is always flavorful and the service and is always so friendly. So glad to have a place like this so close to my house. We used to have to drive 20 minutes for Indian food half as good. Even better, they deliver for free within a 2 kilometers. Best Indian food in Vancouver!
Taste is good and solid deals/specials on each day

We tried the Grace of India and the food was great, freshly cooked very tasty and well presented. The menu is extraordinary with mouth-watering dishes. The staff was attentive and service overall was amazing. The interior of the restaurant just adds up to the experience.  Overall a perfect place for dining with a great value; we will definitely be going back. Highly recommend to try it for a mesmerizing delicious Indian food adventure.
It was so delicious and very reasonably priced.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star rating Joanne, we hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Our first experience of Grace of India was on their second day and it was amazing. Great service, flavourful and delicious food. The spices and flavours and fresh cooked food are offered on a wide menu of choices. So good we went back tonight to have more. Can t recommend it enough. You gotta eat here.

Delicious food and really friendly staff. The veggie samosas were cheap and really tasty. We also ordered the spinach paneer, butter chicken and prawn curry, all of which were flavourful and not too spicy. Will definitely come back on Monday nights for their $8.99 curry and rice special!
Amazing food and very clean restaurant!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Troy! We look forward to having you in again soon!

reviews.review_text: On the corner of East 22nd and Kingsway rests a quaint Indian cuisine restaurant. I stumbled upon this establishment by coincidence and am extremely grateful for having our paths crossed. The service was exceptional. My server was patient and helpful when ordering. I had many questions and all were answered to my satisfaction. The food arrived shortly after placing my order. I live in Surrey and have had many experiences with Indian food, however, Grace of India truly pushed the boundaries of what is expected of a typical Indian dish. The flavour was perfectly seasoned and quite bountiful. I asked for medium spicy and it was perfect. There is much more to say and are all positive. The experience was enriched with the excellent service and the refreshing glass of iced water. I felt comfortable and am happy to recommend Grace of India to anyone who enjoys quality Indian cuisine. I leave you with these last words. Many are outspoken about having quality over quantity, but at Grace of India, you get the opportunity to experience both. Please be sure to afford yourself the opportunity to experience their excellent Monday Special!

A beautiful family run restaurant. The food is absolutely fantastic!  Some of my favorite dishes are the lamb curry and butter chicken. Excellent flavour and always very friendly. Thank you so much for the delicious Indian!

Stopped in for lunch and had their butter chicken special. Enjoyed every bite! The chicken was so tender sometimes my fork tines broke a large piece unwillingly. Warm, welcoming atmosphere and the waiter was very helpful as well!

The Monday special at this place cant be beat! It is a great deal for any curry with rice and naan for $8.99. Lots of good vegetarian options. On different occasions Ive tried the palak paneer and malai kofta. Serving sizes were ample, and the curries well balanced.The rice fresh and fluffy, and the garlic naan was very fresh too. Service was polite and prompt. The young woman and young man serving us this evening were welcoming and attentive. Thank you for a great meal and experience   we will be back again soon!

My favorite Indian restaurant in Vancouver   the food is authentic Indian, always super fresh and extremely rich in flavour, the restautant is cosy and the service is amazingly kind and caring! The portions will make you happily full and the prices will not hurt your wallet. They usually have some special offer going on eirher for lunch or combo dinner for two, then there is the Monday deal any curry with naan and rice for 8.99CAD, if that is not enough they have some combo options on the menu, theres always plenty to choose from! Weather youre here just for some samosas and masala tea or some amazing curry with naan you will leave this place satisfied and happy My favorite meals are Eggplant Bartha, Fish Korma, Rogan Josh, Lamb Masala and of course butter chicken!!! Actually, there was never a time when i did not enjoy the food i have ordered here. Oh and also their raita is perfect Love the Grace Of India soooo muuuuch!!!

We ve been coming here for the past few months and this place never ceases to surprise in a very positive way! The food is spectacular and the staff is extremely friendly too. They have a large variety of options from meat to veggie friendly. Definitely a must try if you re looking for good Indian food!

This is our weekly if not twice local Indian lunch spot.  Mondays are of course their infamous lunch special day for $8.99 which is a steal of a deal for the fresh, delicious, well portioned meal.  We get a bit more spice added to ours.  I find asking for a 7 out of 10 gives the kick I love in Indian food.  They have yummy papadan for gluten free folk and they will alter if necessary the veggie ones to be vegan if asked.  Most have milk but will do coconut milk and leave out paneer if specified as all made from scratch.  Very friendly family and always clean and welcoming. Were going to miss them when we move. :(

We absolutely enjoyed our experience here. We had a coupon which gave us mains an appetizer and a wine each. The amount of food we got for that price was a steal. I thoroughly enjoyed the taste and quality of the meal too. We will definitely be back.

EXCELLENT customer service as well food. The lady on the phone was so nice. According to my taste , she provided me the food i wanted. Thank you so much guys for amazing food nd 100/100 for your customer service. Really appreciated. good job guys.

Came here for dinner and was surprised at how empty it was. The steady stream of food delivery pick up drivers confirmed what we then experienced ourselves: the food is fantastic and I highly recommend the butter chicken. One of the best Ive had

Decent food and excellent service with a somewhat upscale feel dining in that does not put off the casual take out customer. It s also nice to have a more North Indian menu in a neighbourhood that already has several South Indian and Indochinese options. Prices are affordable and there are daily specials for the more budget conscious.
I went here thrice only for Chole Bhature. Most recommended. They have an offer on this every Tuesday. Loves the food and its quality.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star review! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Fantastic addition to the neighbourhood. Shaheed paneer is our go-to, but we haven t tried anything we didn t like. Service is great as well. Their Monday special of a curry+rice+naan for $8.99 is such great value that there s no point cooking at home! Highly recommend!

Excellent food, great service. Ive tried most of the vegetarian items and love them! The butter vegetables are my favorite especially with some naan on the side.  The eggplant bhartha is also a favorite although everything is delicious.

Ive tried this place twice now, through DoorDash (exploring new places to support while staying home) -- its incredibly good! Im one of those boring people who always orders butter chicken, but whatever I love it and theirs is excellent - Ill definitely keep coming back (figuratively since its delivery). The chicken is tender and the sauce is light and savoury. The chicken pakora is also great. My boyfriend has has two of the paneers and said both were among the best hes had. The portions were also big, I had leftovers.

Awesome food and great customer service. Coconut chicken and the lamb curry is to die for. Its like eating home cooked food. Best cooked and great tasting dishes in the whole city I would say. Definitely going back again and again.
Hidden gem on Kingsway. The best Indian food in Vancouver. Customer service is great. Price is reasonable as compared to other Indian restaurants.

Fabulous and unpretentious place on the Kingsway. Comfortable room and tables with lots of space and excellent service but make no mistake this spot is all about the food. Everything is fresh and beautifully prepared. Their hot is nice and spicy but not overwhelming. Flavors are well differentiated between dishes. Its hard to go wrong ordering anything here but some favorites include the eggplant bharta, any of the Korma dishes, prawn vindaloo, lamb rogan josh and the fish curry. Garlic naan and mango lhassi are essential additions to the meal. Reasonably priced and a great place for a family dinner. Currently my go-to place for Indian food.

Tried Grace of India for the first time last night and we will definitely be back.  Their food was excellent (we had the lamb kebabs and bhindi), naan were great and our server was friendly and attentive. They also do take out and delivery through Door Dash and Just Eat, which we will be using.  Recommend people check out this new Indian restaurant in the neighborhood.

The best indian home like food. I am from delhi and always crave the chatpata food I used to eat their but this resturant makes me feel like home. Each and everything they cook has love in it. My favourite can be yours too
A friend recommended us this place, and I m so glad they did! Everything we get is always delicious and reasonably priced, it s speedy, plus they have great specials!

Was really looking forward to trying out their dishes. :( Unfortunately doordash couldnt find a driver for an hour. The restaurant was kind enough to call and explain the situation so Ill leave a good review for communication.

Its one of the best places to go if you are craving some Indian food. The restaurant is nice and cozy with a simple yet elegant decor. The staff is very professional, yet they are easy to mingle with. The restaurant is family run, and its quite amazing place to go to.

Great food. Great staff. Great experience. The food was very well prepared and the gave us 2 complementary dishes  as well. Food was ready quick. Price is higher than other places but with good reason.

Had a work lunch function here with 12 people.  I made reservations and called the morning of with a list of pre-orders which they kindly accommodated.  Lunch was delicious with good portions.  Our waiter was very helpful and kind. A wonderful place to visit for quality food.

My #1 go to place for Indian delivery in Vancouver. They have some of the best selection of vegetarian dishes Ive seen. All their dishes are so delicious. The veggie korma and butter paneer are my favourites. Ace samosas, naan, and kheer too. Plus the staff are so friendly! One of them was my absolute hero today because he brought me a Slurpee with my delivery order because I was too hungover to leave the house. I love you sir!!!! I dont know your name but I LOVE YOU
Came back to this lovely restaurant this time with friends staff made us feel very welcomed the food was delicious just like last time  will be coming back for my next visit

We have the most flavorful and fresh food, nice and clean Indian Cuisine Restaurant, good customer service, great atmosphere. We also count with a full bar. It is family owned Restaurant, proudly run by our entire family.

Words are limited to express the experience I had tonight at this place. Fabulous fusion of food with authentic Indian taste. Very well priced place, with more than friendly customer service. Definitely going back soon.

The food was delicious and very appetizing! Reasonably priced as well. The portions were reasonably sized. We left the restaurant with enough leftovers for another meal for two. Definitely a restaurant to come back to in the near future!

Fresh cooked delicious meals whether you eat in or take out. Its just like home cooked meals. Love the atmosphere and friendly staff. I continue to go there and order takeout when I dont feel like cooking. Ten out of ten for me!

Very clean and cozy atmosphere. Servers are very pleasant and also helps you make right choice depending on your liking. Food is WOW....I have not had this good of india food anywhere else. Its a must place to try out..u cant go wrong. As the name says..its got grace of real India. My favorite place to go for Indian cuisine. Thank u guyz! See u again soon!
The staff was warm, helpful and friendly. Food was great flavor and quality and we were asked how spicy   we like it. Would definitely return to Grace of India
Awesome new place. The food is delicious the service is excellent. 10 out of 10 will be back again. The prices are comparable. I especially liked that you can pick how spicy you want your food.

This is now our go to takeout restaurant in the neighbourhood.  Our menu favourites are Aloo Gobhi, Butter Paneer, Chicken Tikka and of course the garlic naan bread.  Weve ordered at least 5 times now and delivery has been prompt.  Highly recommend!
Great new place for some authentic Indian food. The menu has some unique dishes that are hard to find anywhere else. Well stocked bar too. Definitely recommended if youre in the area!

My favorite indian place in Vancouver. Discovered them because of their curry monday deals and their food and service is the best. So many amazing vegetarian meals!!! Wouldnt dream of going anywhere else with an Indian craving! We now go every monday without fail - never over it.

Fantastic place to eat indian cuisine in kingsway.In their meal you can taste the time and passion they dedicate to cook each dish. Expect professional friendly services. First tym i visited that place and tried channa masala, palak paneer and shahi paneer with rice and naan...all the things are very delicious . Must visit once and try what you want to eat.hope you will enjoyed a lot.
This restaurant did not disappoint. It was my first time at this place. Food is delicious with  reasonable price and super friendly staff. Would recommend it 10/10.

Ive been looking for a great Indian place in East Van and Grace of India finally fit the bill! I tried them last week and have already ordered again. Everything tastes fresh and the naan and chicken karahi are delicious.

Great Indian Restaurant. I ordered Shahi Paneer with Chapatis. The flavour of the Shahi Paneer was awesome made with gravy and paneer, not like the other restaurants which put only capsicums and onions. Thanks Grace of India for such a delicious food.
I ordered chole bature and amritsari kulcha and it was really good. Definitely worth it and must try. I have been browsing through their menu and all other dishes have been a delight.

Great quality Indian food, very consistent, fast service. This place deserves to be busier than it is! (Though I admit I might be part of the problem, always ordering takeout..) als, TRY THE MUKHWAS (fennel candy by the cash register) !!!!
Amazing service, amazing food! Would highly recommend for authentic Indian food from a family run business :)
The staff here are super friendly and the food is delicious, especially for the value. The any curry plus naan and rice special for $8.99 on Mondays is pretty impossible to beat.
We visit Vancouver from Seattle and go to Grace of India every time. Excellent and friendly service, delicious dishes, great value. We always enjoy our return to Grace!
Great food must try. The customer service is top notch and its a family owned business. The son of the owner really works hard to keep everything running. 5/5 would come again

Food was amazing... & service was great.. Really like the restaurant.. Menu is well designed & there is lots of choices..server was very friendly.. Great service.. highly recommend anyone to try to great Indian food.
THE BEST INDIAN RESTAURANT I VE BEEN IN CANADA. Literally love the food, ambience, hospitality and specially the Indian tea          Must must visit!!!!
Exceeded expectations. Delicious lamb curry. Very friendly service. Chill place to get some serious food. Five stars.
The most underrated restaurant i would say. The place with best ambiance and food. All my specials dates with my girlfriend, i have planned at this place
Ive tried all the curries nearby and I think they have the best lamb korma~ They also do $9 curry Mondays!
So good, Ive become a regular! Delicious food, decent prices, outstanding service, and open til 10. Their naan is the best!
My go to Indian restaurant in Vancouver. Prices are reasonable and the food tastes amazing. Service is always friendly at this family run business.
A really great experience. The service is great and very friendly. On top of this, their Monday special is a great deal and comes with a good amount of food. Definitely will be back again!

Came To Vancouver from Calgary  for my birthday was recommended to come here the food here was really good !!! The customer service was excellent Everyone was very friendly I recommend my clients from Calgary who often go to Vancouver to try this place out they were very pleased and happy when they came
The tandoori chicken special on Thursday is quite tasty and great value. Parking: There is a parking lot to the west that is free in the evenings. Food : 5/5 |
Excellent customer service. Did an order through DoorDash with some slight difficulties, and the staff were so quick to help with our order and called us back to make sure we got the ordering right!
amazing food, great prices. this is the place you want to go to.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jackson, Thank you for your positive review! We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Food is absolutely delicious and the portions are huge. Service is very fast and friendly. Definitely a great spot to come with friends and family.
Amazing service and amazing food .. got a great Monday special for a few dollars more than the dosa places close by but with nice naans, rice and curries.. so so delicious.. will be back very soon
Fantastic food! Highly recommend the malai fish and vindaloo lamb. Everyone who works there is super friendly and down to earth. Try the paneer naan!
